products.title: Henderson, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: Neatly opposing stitching forms the sophisticated stripes of the henderson cream, where a barely-there cream shade provides the canvas. The straight, vertical louvres help to form a sleek and streamlined appearance, accentuating that of the stripes. For a luxe and classic look in the master bedroom, settle the cream against matching cream walls and furnish with dark, polished woods to give a contrasting effect.

products.title: Richmond, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: Adorned with feathery curved lines, in textured raised stitching, the richmond in cream is a subtle yet artistic piece, and its soft cream hue leaves nothing to be desired. Lightweight enough to feel light and airy, yet sturdy enough to hang neatly in louvres, this is a blind with both practical and stylish qualities. Team the cream with a bolder hue for maximum impact, choosing a deep maroon or burgundy for a grand look in the dining room.

products.title: Voile Fr Moondust Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Voile fr moondust grey is a semi-translucent stylish, dark grey vertical and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen, bathroom or bedroom will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in ths modern grey shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant and pollergen-coated, makes this sheer vertical blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.description: Glow, a special glow in the dark roller which lights up the room at night, perfect for a child's room. Perfect for your little one's bedroom, glow in the dark is a blackout grey-toned fabric which is a perfect way to bring the night sky inside. Leave the blind extended down with room lights on and door closed a minimum 30 minutes prior to lights out for the glow-in-the-dark effect to have maximum impact.

products.title: Vista, Basic White - Venetian Blind
products.description: For all of the cool, with less of the colour, choose the vista in basic white, a sturdy blind made from heavy gauge aluminium, fully adjustable using the pull-cords so that you can allow more or less light in with ease. Made with perforated slats to let the light gently filter through when open or closed, creating a soft atmosphere. Industrialise your home office, where all the work gets done, by settling the basic white amongst functional white furniture and brushed silver fittings.

products.title: Leafy Jungle Roller Blind
products.description: Add some vibrancy to your windows with the leafy jungle roller blind. With it's green and grey colour scheme this blind packs a punch and is a great way of adding colour to your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.
